docs.text: Welcome to Summit 2022!! I can't believe we are here, in person , on March 474 2020. It feels like just yesterday we were all gathered together, just across the street from where we are now! What is this? This is a homepage, inside an index.md file in the docs folder of the repo. These are cool, it's just Markdown so you can do all your normal trics if you so choose.
docs.title: Welcome to Summit 2022!!

docs.text: Get-DadJoke SYNOPSIS This is as terrible as it sounds SYNTAX Get-DadJoke [<CommonParameters>] DESCRIPTION Tells you a dad joke. It's really creepy. EXAMPLES EXAMPLE 1 Get-DadJoke It's super simple PARAMETERS CommonParameters This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters . INPUTS OUTPUTS NOTES I blame @juddmissile for this RELATED LINKS

docs.text: Get-PackageIcon SYNOPSIS Internalizes icon for Chocolatey Package from Community Repository SYNTAX Get-PackageIcon [-InternalizerDownloadPath] <String[]> [-IconRepository] <String> [-PackageRepository] <String> [-Credential] <PSCredential> [[-ApiKey] <String>] [<CommonParameters>] DESCRIPTION Downloads and publishes icon for internalized Chocolatey package to your own hosted repository. Re-writes package icon url in nuspec to new internal url. EXAMPLES EXAMPLE 1 Get-PackageIcon -InternalizerDownloadPath C:\packages -IconRepository https://repo.fabrikam.com/repository/icons -PackageRepository https://repo.fabrikam.com/repository/packages PARAMETERS -InternalizerDownloadPath Path where internalized packages are located Type: String[] Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: True Position: 1 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False -IconRepository Url to your icon repository Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: True Position: 2 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False -PackageRepository Url to your package repository Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: True Position: 3 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False -Credential Credential to upload to your repository Type: PSCredential Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: True Position: 4 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False -ApiKey API to push fixed package to your package repository Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: False Position: 5 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False CommonParameters This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters . INPUTS OUTPUTS NOTES RELATED LINKS
docs.title: Get-PackageIcon

docs.text: New-FileSystemWatcher SYNOPSIS Creates a filesystem watcher for building Chocolatey packages SYNTAX New-FileSystemWatcher [[-Path] <String>] [<CommonParameters>] DESCRIPTION Starts a filesystem watcher allowing you to drop binaries into a folder, and get Chocolatey packages out the other end EXAMPLES EXAMPLE 1 New-FileSystemWatcher -Path C:\drop PARAMETERS -Path Path for the watcher Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: False Position: 1 Default value: C:\drop Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False CommonParameters This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters . INPUTS OUTPUTS NOTES RELATED LINKS

docs.text: Set-CCMCert SYNOPSIS Certificate renewal script for Chocolatey Central Management(CCM) SYNTAX Set-CCMCert [-CertificateThumbprint] <String> [<CommonParameters>] DESCRIPTION This script will go through and renew the certificate association with both the Chocolatey Central Management Service and IIS Web hosted dashboard. EXAMPLES Example 1 PS C:\> {{ Add example code here }} {{ Add example description here }} PARAMETERS -CertificateThumbprint Thumbprint value of the certificate you would like the Chocolatey Central Management Service and Web to run on. Please make sure the certificate is located in both the Cert:\LocalMachine\TrustedPeople\ and Cert:\LocalMachine\My certificate stores. Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: True Position: 1 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False CommonParameters This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters . INPUTS OUTPUTS NOTES RELATED LINKS
docs.title: Set-CCMCert

docs.text: Set-NexusCert SYNOPSIS Certificate renewal script for Nexus. SYNTAX Set-NexusCert [-Thumbprint] <String> [[-NexusPort] <String>] [<CommonParameters>] DESCRIPTION Helps edit the java keystore file for Nexus when doing a certificate renewal. EXAMPLES EXAMPLE 1 Set-NexusCert.ps1 -Thumbprint 'Your_Certificate_Thumbprint_Value' -NexusPort 'Port_Number' PARAMETERS -Thumbprint Thumbprint value of certificate you want to run Nexus on. Make sure certificate is located at Cert:\LocalMachine\TrustedPeople\ Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: True Position: 1 Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False -NexusPort Port you have Nexus configured to run on. Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: False Position: 2 Default value: 8443 Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False CommonParameters This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters . INPUTS OUTPUTS NOTES RELATED LINKS
docs.title: Set-NexusCert

docs.title: SYNOPSIS

docs.text: Set-NexusCert [-Thumbprint] <String> [[-NexusPort] <String>] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.text: Set-NexusCert.ps1 -Thumbprint 'Your_Certificate_Thumbprint_Value' -NexusPort 'Port_Number'

docs.title: -Thumbprint

docs.text: Port you have Nexus configured to run on. Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Required: False Position: 2 Default value: 8443 Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False
